public void create()

Specified by:

See Also:
ModelsTables#createModelInfoTable(), ModelsTables#createModelsStackTable()

createModelsStackTable

protected void createModelsStackTable()
Creates the table MODELS_STACK which contains information about the id of the next model to be trained. The structure of this table is: 

 | MODELS_STACK |
 |==============|
 | STAACK (INT) |
 |--------------|
 |      *       |
 |      *       |

See Also:
ModelsDB#createModelInfoTable(), ModelsDB#isModel(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), ModelsDB#registerNewModel(java.lang.String), ModelsDB#removeModel(java.lang.String)

createModelInfoTable

protected void createModelInfoTable()
Generates the table that contains information about models. The structure of this table is: 

 |                     MODEL_INFO                         |
 |========================================================|
 | MODEL_ID (INT) | MODEL_URI (TXT) | ALGORITHM_URI (TXT) |
 |----------------|-----------------|---------------------|
 |        *       |        *        |          *          |
 |        *       |        *        |          *          |

See Also:
ModelsDB#createModelsStackTable(), ModelsDB#IncreaseModelStack(), ModelsDB#isModel(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), ModelsDB#registerNewModel(java.lang.String), ModelsDB#removeModel(java.lang.String)

IncreaseModelStack

private void IncreaseModelStack()
Increases the model stack. This method is invoked after a successful training of a new model when the model is registered in the database.

See Also:
ModelsDB#registerNewModel(java.lang.String)

getModelsStack

public int getModelsStack()
Returns the number of models currently in the database.

Returns:
the first available model id.

registerNewModel

public int registerNewModel(java.lang.String AlgID)
Registers a new trained model in database

Parameters:
AlgID - URI of the algorithm used to train the model
Returns:
New model's ID

removeModel

public void removeModel(java.lang.String ID)
This method is used to delete a model registered in the database.

Parameters:
ID - The ID of the model to be deleted

isModel

public boolean isModel(java.lang.String ID,
                       java.lang.String Model)
Checks if a model was built with a given algorithm. e.g. isModel(10,"svm") returns true if the model with ID = 10 is an SVM model.

Parameters:
ID - the id of the model.
Model -
Returns:
The logical value of the answer to the submitted query.
See Also:
ModelsDB#registerNewModel(java.lang.String), ModelsDB#removeModel(java.lang.String), ModelsDB#getAlgorithm(java.lang.String)
